alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Allen, south central Defiance and central Paulding Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodburn, or 12 miles east of New Haven, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Antwerp around 610 PM EDT. Paulding around 620 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and northwestern and west central Ohio.
